feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: KDM Transaction Key Not Triggering in Customizing System During MIRO Testing in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Description:
Hello Experts,
In our SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (3-system landscape) – production system, we observed that during MIRO posting, the system creates a journal entry with the following lines:
• Vendor – Credit
• GR/IR – Debit
• BSX (Material) – Credit
• KDM – Credit
However, the G/L account assigned to KDM was maintained as a Balance Sheet account, which is incorrect.
We have corrected this in Automatic Account Determination by assigning a P&L G/L account for the KDM transaction key.
To validate this correction, we are trying to replicate the same MIRO posting in our customizing (test) tenant, but the system is not triggering the KDM line item.

• Test Scenario in Customizing System:
• Material with zero stock and price control = V (Moving Average)
• Supplier currency: EUR
• PO and GRN posted on 14th Oct with exchange rate (e.g. 1 EUR = X IQD)
• MIRO posted on 15th Oct with a different exchange rate
• Expected: KDM line to be triggered
• Actual: No KDM line item generated in accounting entry

• Our Objective:
We want to validate that the corrected P&L G/L account is being picked up for KDM before moving the configuration to production. Please suggest how can we trigger KDM key

entry.title: how to show up payment methods that we need , like cash or paycheque.
entry.content:
on our CBC, we can see only three payment methods: Foreign bank transfer, Electronic Monetary Claim,  and domestic transfer. but we need to assign payment methods like cash or pay cheque.

do we miss some configuration or do we need to add some payment methods ?

entry.title: Delivery date in Purchase request
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I've noticed that in Purchase Orders, the delivery date is based on the Planned Delivery Time, but in Purchase Requisitions, it's calculated as Planned Delivery Time plus 3 days. I couldn’t find where this extra time is maintained.

Also, the GR Processing Time doesn’t seem to affect the delivery date in either PR or PO. Can someone clarify where this time is actually considered?

Best regards 

Dinesh

entry.title: Clarification on MRP Behaviour for Split Procurement Between Supplying Plant and External Vendor
entry.content:
Dear Support Team,

We have a coming demo for a customer which they particularly asked for few scenarios. I would like to seek clarification on the one of the MRP scenario involving two plants.

Scenario:

  • Plant A – Requirement is created through a weekly PIR for a raw material.

  • Plant B – Acts as the supplying plant with no demand of its own but has stock available to supply Plant A.

  • In Plant A, the material master is maintained with a Special Procurement Key to source from Plant B.

Expectation:

  1. When MRP runs in Plant A, it should create a Stock Transport Requisition (STO) from Plant B to cover the PIR demand.

  2. Later, if Plant B does not have enough stock available, and the PIR quantity in Plant A is increased, the next MRP run in Plant A should:

    • Create an STO for the quantity available in Plant B, and

    • Create an external Purchase Requisition for the remaining shortage, which Plant B cannot fulfil.

Question:
Does MRP in Plant A check the stock availability in Plant B before generating procurement proposals? If Plant B only has partial stock, can the system automatically generate an STO for the available quantity and an external PR for the remaining requirement within the same MRP run? Or will it continue to create only the STO as per the special procurement setup?

I understand that a possible workaround could be to use Quota Management to manage multiple sources of supply. However, this option is not feasible in this case, as the customer does not wish to use quota arrangements for this scenario.

Please confirm if the expected split procurement behaviour is supported in standard SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, or if an enhancement or specific configuration is required to achieve it.

Best regards,
Vindhya

entry.title: reservation not creating automatically from Purchase requisition in SAP public cloud
entry.content:
Hi All,

Reservation(goods issue-201) is not automatically created from purchase requisition in sap public cloud.
I have maintained purchasing group and material group in the "settings for creation of reservation" and maintained the same in material. Any solution on this ?

Thank you

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud 2508 / Question on the implementation of BADI MRM_WORKFLOW_AGENTS with custom field
entry.content:
Hello experts,
im currently working on an implementation for the "Flexible workflow for parked invoice as complete". In this context i wanted to use  the BADI "MRM_WORKFLOW_AGENTS" to create a custom determination of the approvers in this workflow. 

My question is, is there a way to add additional parameters, that can be imported and used for this BADI Implementation ?
I especially wanted to use a custom field, that i created for supplier invoices, in this BADI code and determine the approver based on its value.

Best regards 
Lukas

entry.title: IAM Apps tab missing in Maintain Business Roles app after transport to QAS (S/4HANA Cloud Public Edi
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

We are currently using SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition and have two tenants: DEV and QAS.

On the DEV system, we created a custom Business Role via the Maintain Business Roles app.
The role includes IAM-related catalogs, and everything displays correctly — especially the IAM Apps tab within the role details screen.

However, after transporting the same role to the QAS system, the IAM Apps tab is completely missing from the Maintain Business Roles UI.
Other tabs (like Business Catalogs, Restrictions, etc.) appear as usual.

I’ve confirmed that:

  • The business catalog assignments are identical in both systems.

  • My user has SAP_BR_ADMINISTRATOR and other required authorizations.

  • The role object was transported successfully without error.

Has anyone experienced this behavior before?
Is there a specific configuration or authorization required to make the IAM Apps tab visible in QAS as well?

Any advice or SAP Note reference would be appreciated 🙏

Thanks in advance

entry.title: Is it possible to set third decimal point as Base Quantities in the Public Cloud system?
entry.content:
Dear support team,

Currently, we are faced with an issue that, when we attempt to set a third decimal points as Base Quantities, we get the error "CP466"

Is there a way to make it possible for base quantities to have a third decimal points? And if so, are there any concerns to be noted by the change?

Kind regards,

Fujita

entry.title: Process Flow for Asset Intercompany Sale with Revenue in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Could someone explain the end-to-end process flow for asset intercompany sale with revenue recognition in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud?

Any detailed guidance or specific configuration tips will be appreciated.

Best Regards,

Nithin

entry.title: Problem with alternative valuation rund CKMLCPAVR
entry.content:
Hi experts,

Initial situation:
Existing ECC 6.0 EHP 8
New general ledger accounting active (4 ledgers in use)
Material ledger active
Alternative valuation run CKMLCPAVR with delta posting logic for company in Turkey

Problem:
We are in the process of converting from ECC to S/4 2023 FP3. This changes the data structures with regard to the material ledger and also the posting logic of the ML runs CKMLCP and CKMLCPAVR.
For our plant in Turkey, we first execute CKMLCP and then CKMLCPAVR for ledger L1 in ECC. The aim is to use this to perform the legal valuation of inventories with different rates.
This procedure is no longer possible with S/4. CKMLCPAVR can no longer be executed if a regular CKMLCP has already been executed.

SAP now points out that for this constellation, the parallel valuation of production costs and the regular, parallel valuation must still be introduced within ECC, as subsequent introduction for active company codes in S/4 is no longer possible.

Are there companies here with a similar problem and experience with a solution without parallel valuation?

Thanks in advance

Marco

entry.title: Notification on Rejection of PR
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

Is there an option to notify the user who created the Purchase Request if it gets rejected during the approval process in the Public cloud ?

Best regards,

Dinesh

entry.title: How to Add Value help from standard/Custom VH CDS view to a field in Custom business object?
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I would like to know if it is possible to add a value help (F4 help) to a field in a Custom Business Object (CBO) using either a standard CDS view or a custom value help CDS view.

Currently, the Custom Business Object app in the Key User extensibility tools only seems to allow value help through Associated Business Objects. However, we are looking to reuse an existing CDS-based value help that is not exposed as an associated BO.

Could you please advise if this is achievable?
If yes, I would highly appreciate your guidance on the required steps or best practices to implement it.

Thank you in advance for your support.

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Research and Development

entry.title: Unable to Create New Field Selection Key in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
The issue involves the inability to modify the field status (e.g., mandatory, optional, etc.) in the Field Selection Key for purchase order types in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition. User seeks confirmation on whether it is possible to create a new Field Selection Key in the SAP public cloud system and requests guidance on how to achieve this.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: TRM Released Indicator set as Blocked
entry.content:
Hello Experts, 

I'm trying to set up a loan with variable interest rates in Public Cloud, but when looking at cash flow the release indicator is set as blocked.  However, when I set up a loan with fixed interest rate it was never blocked. I did not use different product type, transaction type or a counter party. 

If you have solution on why the block is happening and how to unblock it so flows could be posted, I would greatly appreciate your help. 

Thank you

entry.title: "Display Journal Entries - New Version" now redirects to "Line Item in Entry View"
entry.content:
Hi all,

Recently when we try to navigate to "Display Journal Entries - New Version" from Manage Supplier Line Items, Manage Customer Line Items, Display Line Items in General Ledger, or Manage Billing Documents it now redirects to "Line Item in Entry View" instead of "Journal Entry".

Is anyone able to advise why this might be happening? Is there a way to revert it back to how it was?

Thanks

entry.title: Issue with CBO App UI Not Visible After Moving to QA
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have created a Custom Business Object (CBO) and assigned a business catalog SAP_FIN_BC_SA_PER_PC  to it. In the development system, the app name was visible and working fine. However, after transporting it to the QA system, the “Generate UI” option is showing as disabled, and the app name is not visible.

All the related artifacts for the CBO have been moved to QA, and I have also tried re-importing the collection , but the issue still persists.

Could you please suggest what might be causing this issue or what steps I can take to resolve it?

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Sales Order Report
entry.content:
Hello 

Im looing at how other users of SAP 4/HANA Public Cloud do a sales report (that shows sales for month by sales order with their respective costs) that reconciles to the GL (revenue and costs). 

We have normal trading goods but also MTO/MTS products. At present our report is coming from billing (custom CDS) and reconciles to the revenue in the GL but its the COGS that dont match (especially for the MTO/MTS products). 

How do others report on their sales/COGS in on report that reconciles to their GL? If a custom CDS what views do you use?

This is for public cloud. 

Thanks


Adam
